messages.subject: ALL Unschooling Minnesota is just 6 weeks away!
messages.msgSnippet: When people go to a homeschooling conference, it s likely there will be speakers who aren t homeschoolers and might not even know any unschoolers. When
messages.messageBody:
"When people go to a homeschooling conference, it's likely there will be speakers who aren't homeschoolers and might not even know any unschoolers.

When unschoolers go to homeschooling conferences, the same thing can happen, in that even the homeschooling speakers might know nothing about unschooling.

Time to wind down slowly, and clarify, to laugh and to smile is missing from big conferences. Here, those things are scheduled. After many years of attending and presenting at conferences, I've heard many times that someone came just to hear me, or just to hear the unschooling speakers. At least half the time, too, the room I'm assigned is busy until just before time, and we have to get out quickly, or parents have to leave to get their children. We will have adjoining rooms—one for quiet play, and one for the presentations and meetings." Sandra Dodd


http://allunschoolingminnesota2013.blogspot.com/


Registration still open and hotel conference rates still holds. If you are planning to attend make your reservations now!


 
Alex Polikowsky

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
